subject: Want to be on the top all night long?
body:
Looking for an effective and cheap solution to have sex like you had 10 years ago?
Click here to be the best lover in the world!
We have only high-quality national medications at low prices. There is no need for someone to know about your sexual problems. 
All this you can find here
The same pills at the united states drug stores are several times more expensive. Make the right choice!
With best regards,
Peter French
 
 
Sidel i besstrastno rassmatrival menia vypuklymi rybimi glazami. Ia byla Ne v silah ego ostanovit. Est i eshche odna sereznaia prichina pryzhki na mezhplanetnye Rasstoianiia vyzyvaiut ogromnye zatraty sil. Zombi ne imeiut Zhelanij. 
Kak i Ferma, eto veshch prinadlezhit rase hkasi, a ia, Kak uzhe govoril, umeiu obrashchatsia s ih naslediem. Imenno ob etom i byl ego son. Gorod nashpigovan Empatami, i ne stoit slishkom udivliatsia, esli sredi nih vdrug najdetsia Istinnyj telepat. Kak i vsegda. I malost protrezveli. Ochen bolshaia. Kotoroe v Principe mozhno bylo by evakuirovat, i dovolno bystro, pri ego-to Malochislennosti. Besplotnyj, Lork rval Mne gorlo, kromsal myshcy i suhozhiliia. 
Eshche liubliu. Ia podumal Bylo, chto sejchas on nakinetsia na menia kak na narushitelia vooruzhennogo Peremiriia, kotoroe u menia slozhilos s Bigmanom, no on ni slovom ne Obmolvilsia ob etom. Obval prekratilsia. Bochonok nikak ne otreagiroval na zvuk. ejisuminyon VVFcRlhQUVh0QllXUkAbREVSQFBDXlxbG1JT
